languages.text: {n}Ужасная вонь доносится до вас задолго до того, как становится виден ее источник — коридор, куда пробитые трубы извергают потоки мутной жижи. На отдалении виднеется рычаг, открывающий двери наружу. Подойти к нему можно, только окунувшись в жижу.{/n}

{n}A horrible stench reaches your nostrils long before you see its source — a corridor where punctured pipes are disgorging streams of murky sludge. In the distance, you see the lever that opens the doors leading outside. The only way to reach it is by submerging yourself in the sludge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ужасная вонь доносится до вас задолго до того, как становится виден ее источник — коридор, куда пробитые трубы извергают потоки мутной жижи. На отдалении виднеется рычаг, открывающий двери наружу. Подойти к нему можно, только окунувшись в жижу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A horrible stench reaches your nostrils long before you get to see its source — a corridor where punctured pipes are disgorging streams of murky sludge. In the distance, you see the lever that opens the doors leading outside. The only way to reach it is by submerging oneself in the sludge.{/n}

{n}A horrible stench reaches your nostrils long before you get to see its source — a corridor where punctured pipes are disgorging streams of murky sludge. In the distance, you see the lever that opens the doors leading outside. The only way to reach it is by submerging oneself in the sludge.{/n}

{n}A horrible stench reaches your nostrils long before you see its source — a corridor where punctured pipes are disgorging streams of murky sludge. In the distance, you see the lever that opens the doors leading outside. The only way to reach it is by submerging yourself in the sludge.{/n}

{n}A horrible stench reaches your nostrils long before you see its source — a corridor where punctured pipes are disgorging streams of murky sludge. In the distance, you see the lever that opens the doors leading outside. The only way to reach it is by submerging yourself in the sludge.{/n}

{n}A horrible stench reaches your nostrils long before you see its source — a corridor where punctured pipes are disgorging streams of murky sludge. In the distance, you see the lever that opens the doors leading outside. The only way to reach it is by submerging yourself in the sludge.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一股可怕的恶臭涌入你的鼻孔之中，随后你才看清这股恶臭的源头在哪。在一条走廊上，污浊的淤泥正从破损的管道中汹涌而出。你看到远处有个拉杆，应该可以打开通往外面的门。唯一通往拉杆的方法，就是从深深的污泥之中穿过去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A horrible stench reaches your nostrils long before you see its source — a corridor where punctured pipes are disgorging streams of murky sludge. In the distance, you see the lever that opens the doors leading outside. The only way to reach it is by submerging yourself in the sludge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一股可怕的恶臭涌入你的鼻孔之中，随后你才看清这股恶臭的源头在哪。在一条走廊上，污浊的淤泥正从破损的管道中汹涌而出。你看到远处有个拉杆，应该可以打开通往外面的门。唯一通往拉杆的方法，就是从深深的污泥之中穿过去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un hedor insoportable asalta tus fosas nasales mucho antes de que veas su origen: un pasillo en el que varias tuberías agujereadas sueltan una corriente de cieno turbio. A lo lejos, ves la palanca que abre las puertas al exterior. El único camino que lleva a ella pasa por sumergirte en la mugre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A horrible stench reaches your nostrils long before you see its source — a corridor where punctured pipes are disgorging streams of murky sludge. In the distance, you see the lever that opens the doors leading outside. The only way to reach it is by submerging yourself in the sludge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hedor insoportable asalta tus fosas nasales mucho antes de que veas su origen: un pasillo en el que varias tuberías agujereadas sueltan una corriente de cieno turbio. A lo lejos, ves la palanca que abre las puertas al exterior. El único camino que lleva a ella pasa por sumergirte en la mugre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}発生源を見る前に、鼻がもげるような悪臭が脳を刺激した。回廊のパイプに穴が開いており、濁ったヘドロが流れ出ている。遠くに外へと続く扉を開くレバーが見える。レバーにたどり着くにはヘドロの中をかきわけて進むしかない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A horrible stench reaches your nostrils long before you see its source — a corridor where punctured pipes are disgorging streams of murky sludge. In the distance, you see the lever that opens the doors leading outside. The only way to reach it is by submerging yourself in the sludge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}発生源を見る前に、鼻がもげるような悪臭が脳を刺激した。回廊のパイプに穴が開いており、濁ったヘドロが流れ出ている。遠くに外へと続く扉を開くレバーが見える。レバーにたどり着くにはヘドロの中をかきわけて進むしかない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein furchtbarer Gestank erreicht deine Nase, lange bevor du seinen Ursprung siehst – einen Gang, in dem aus durchlöcherten Rohren Ströme eines dunklen Schlamms treten. Aus der Entfernung erkennst du den Hebel, der die Tür nach draußen öffnet. Es gibt nur einen Weg, um ihn zu erreichen: Du musst dich in den Schlamm begeben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A horrible stench reaches your nostrils long before you see its source — a corridor where punctured pipes are disgorging streams of murky sludge. In the distance, you see the lever that opens the doors leading outside. The only way to reach it is by submerging yourself in the sludge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein furchtbarer Gestank erreicht deine Nase, lange bevor du seinen Ursprung siehst – einen Gang, in dem aus durchlöcherten Rohren Ströme eines dunklen Schlamms treten. Aus der Entfernung erkennst du den Hebel, der die Tür nach draußen öffnet. Es gibt nur einen Weg, um ihn zu erreichen: Du musst dich in den Schlamm begeben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une odeur nauséabonde vous chatouille les narines bien avant que vous n'en trouviez la source : un couloir recouvert d'une espèce de gadoue qui s'écoule des tuyaux percés. Au loin, vous apercevez le levier qui permet d'ouvrir les portes menant vers l'extérieur, mais le seul moyen de l'atteindre, c'est en traversant le bourbier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A horrible stench reaches your nostrils long before you see its source — a corridor where punctured pipes are disgorging streams of murky sludge. In the distance, you see the lever that opens the doors leading outside. The only way to reach it is by submerging yourself in the sludge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une odeur nauséabonde vous chatouille les narines bien avant que vous n'en trouviez la source : un couloir recouvert d'une espèce de gadoue qui s'écoule des tuyaux percés. Au loin, vous apercevez le levier qui permet d'ouvrir les portes menant vers l'extérieur, mais le seul moyen de l'atteindre, c'est en traversant le bourbier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nereden geldiğini anlayamadığın iğrenç bir koku, burnunun direğini kırıyor. Kaynağın, bulanık çamur kusan patlak borularla kaplı bir koridor olduğunu anlıyorsun. İleride, dışarıya çıkışı kapatan kapıları açan bir kol görüyorsun. Kola ulaşmanın tek yolu, çamura bulanmak.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A horrible stench reaches your nostrils long before you see its source — a corridor where punctured pipes are disgorging streams of murky sludge. In the distance, you see the lever that opens the doors leading outside. The only way to reach it is by submerging yourself in the sludge.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nereden geldiğini anlayamadığın iğrenç bir koku burnunun direğini kırıyor. Kaynağın bulanık bir çamur fışkırtan delik borularla kaplı bir koridor olduğunu anlıyorsun. İleride dışarı açılan kapıları açan bir kol görüyorsun. Kola ulaşmanın tek yolu, çamura bulanmak.{/n}
